quote.#text:
A bill to provide for the conveyance of an approximately 80-acre parcel
	 of National Forest System land in the Uinta-Wasatch-Cache National Forest in
	 Utah to Brigham Young University, and for other
	 purposes.

official-title-amendment.#text: Amend the title so as to read:

current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To provide for the conveyance of a small parcel of
		  National Forest System land in the Uinta-Wasatch-Cache National Forest in Utah
		  to Brigham Young University, and for other purposes.
